mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,1,1484826743,e-Mola,MOVITEL SA,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/e-mola/id1484826743?uo=4,0.0,4.25309,162,Finance,"e-Mola is an easiest mobile financial management service that allows customer to deposit, withdraw, transfer money, buy CREDELEC, buy credit, pay wages and more in fast, safe and convenient way through the code *898# on your cell phone.

To become one of the best mobile money services in Mozambique, we launched the App named as e-Mola that would help you increase more experience. Through the App, we would like to make your life easier, more modern, safer.
Which e-Mola App you can do:
Transfer money to any cell phone in Mozambique.
Receive money from the Bank accounts and vice versa.
Receive money from South Africa.
Withdraw money
Buy CREDELEC
Buy water/TV.
Receive salary
Check your balance
etc.
Why use e-Mola:

column2: Support from Movitel Customer Care and Network agent.",2019-10-26T07:00:00Z,2025-11-06T13:46:03Z

column1: mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,2,1442121355,My M-Pesa Mozambique,VM S.A,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/my-m-pesa-mozambique/id1442121355?uo=4,0.0,4.67687,7935,Finance,"Welcome to the new M-Pesa App!
M-Pesa is the largest mobile financial service in Mozambique with more than 4.2 millions of customers and we launching now this new version of the M-Pesa App.
So... What else is new in this version?

column2: Faster login with the new PIN entry screen
Improved home page with shortcuts for some main services
Easy way to navigate through the different services
Higher control in your payments, so you will check the details of the transaction before confirming it
All configurations in one place such as favourite management, account settings and M-Pesa information that are now under Settings option

column1: We keep the best
M-Pesa is a secure way to transact your money, for free! With one touch, you can access to all our services in Mozambique or abroad, 24h/7d
Access to your finances anytime, anywhere

column2: Send money from anywhere in the world with ease, by selecting the contact from your phone book or your favourites
Check your balance account with a single tap
Control your recent transactions, by viewing and downloading the mini statements
Access the app in your preferred language, app supports English and Portuguese

column1: All your accounts in your mobile phone
Transfer money from your mobile wallet to a bank account of Standard Bank, BCI or Millennium Bim, and also from your bank account back to M-Pesa.
Pay easily

column2: Make your payments to businesses and merchants in seconds
Request voucher for your POS BCI payments
Buy Airtime and bundles seamlessly for yourself and your friends and family

column1: Cash out from the largest network of agents
Withdraw or deposit your money from any of our agents across the country.
Fair service with no unnecessary costs
If you want to register and open a M-Pesa account, it’s totally free and you don’t need to have a bank account.
There are also no fees in account maintenance and no requirement for a minimum balance in the account.
It’s secure
Every time you log in, you will need to use your M-Pesa 4 digit PIN.

This is the only official and authorised App for accessing your M-Pesa account in Mozambique. Vodacom Mozambique cautions customers against downloading or attempting to use of any other App that purports to offer easy access to M-Pesa. Don’t share your PIN with anyone else.
A side note
Payment reminders have been temporarily disabled in order to be enhanced. This feature will be reinstated as soon as we can.
Still have questions?
For any information about My M-Pesa App, please call 84111 (for Vodacom Clients) or 85350000 (for Movitel and TMcel). We are here to help you 24h.
You can also contact us through our digital channels:
https://web.facebook.com/MPesaMocambique/

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,3,584629600,Millennium bim Smart IZI,"Banco Comercial Portugues, SA",https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/millennium-bim-smart-izi/id584629600?uo=4,0.0,4.36731,520,Finance,"Navigation mode
The first great feature of this new version is the Look and Feel, which comes along with new colours, layouts, as well as new menus and buttons.

The new Smart IZI layout offers you a different navigation mode from the previous one. Now, after logging in, you can slide to the left or right on the products carousel and have an overview of all your products: accounts, cards, savings and loans. To make it even easier to navigate through the App, the new version of Smart IZI has a fixed navigation bar at the bottom of the screen where you can quickly access to ""day-by-day"", ""transfer"", "" pay"" and ""more"".
Privacy mode

The new version of Smart IZI brings with it the Privacy mode. Designed to ensure a higher confidentiality level of your financial information. With this new mode, you can always choose whether to hide or not your account balances after authentication.
Quick Access
Because simplifying is ""making it more IZI"", the new app has quick navigation options in the top right corner of the ""day-by-day"" feature: Alerts, Settings and Exit button.
Segment Theme/Colors
Now your App can distinguish your segment and define the colours of the visual components according to the Segment to which you belong.
Alerts / Push Notifications

Getting useful information about your assets and news about your Bank has become easier! Simply select the alert icon on the main page. Make sure to access settings first and enable the reception of Push-Notifications.
Settings
In this private area, you can easily:
View and delete favourites;
View authorization codes;
Change the IZI PIN;
Register / Update e-mail;
Reset your Internet Banking password * (new);
Enable / Disable the biometric configuration
Enable / Disable the reception of Push-Notifications (Alerts)
Products Carousel

Navigating left or right, you will be able to view all your products (accounts, cards, savings, savings and loans) and also perform some specific operations for each product. You can also check movements, balances or details of the specific product by selecting the “More details” option.
Transfer
Performing transfer operations has never been easier, this option is also in the navigation bar. See here the type of transfers available for you:
Intrabank Transfers
Interbank Transfers
Transfer for Phone
Mobile Transfers
M-Pesa
E-Mola * (new);
Schedules
Pay
Whenever you want to pay for a service, just click on “Pay” on the navigation bar. Here you can make the following payments:
Credelec;
Vouchers for Phone;
Packages for TV;
Bill Payments;
INSS payment * (new);
Cash Directo.
More
Here we have other no less important operations available to you, such as:
Read QR  Code;
Generate QR  Code;
Savings
IZI Withdrawal
Request Check Book
Send Invitations (only available to Prestige Customers)
You can also view our Contacts, Branches and the current exchange rate.
Patrimony
You will be able to view your assets and liabilities in a graphic and intuitive way, just by clicking on the Patrimony button right below the product carousel.
Favourites

Paying and transferring can be even faster! Save your favourite transactions and re-use them whenever you want to make a next transaction. To do this, just select the option ""Add as Favourite"", at the end of the transaction, and that's it!
Access requirements

You can access Smart IZI through any device with the application installed. Use your mobile banking credentials to access the application, namely, cell phone number associated with the channel and the 4-digit access PIN, known as IZI PIN.
Millennium bim. Aqui Consigo.",2013-01-30T20:56:44Z,2025-10-28T16:21:16Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,4,283646709,"PayPal - Send, Manage, Pay","PayPal, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/paypal-send-manage-pay/id283646709?uo=4,0.0,4.5865,682,Finance,"There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal
SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure
ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​

*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.
MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​

Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply
BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing
SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply
MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​

Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place.
POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply
PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**

*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD",2019-02-03T08:00:00Z,2025-11-17T16:24:16Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,5,804043498,e-Daki,BCI - Banco Comercial e de Investimentos SARL,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/e-daki/id804043498?uo=4,0.0,3.72028,143,Finance,"App e-Daki – Ir ao Banco ficou ainda mais fácil!

A App do BCI aprende consigo e vai-se ajustando às suas preferências, para oferecer-lhe uma experiência mais intuitiva e personalizada. Com a mesma pode efectuar:
Consultas: Saldos, movimentos, posição integrada, histórico de operações e comprovativos.

Cartões: Movimentos e extratos, CashAdvance para cartões de crédito. Pode também solicitar o bloqueio e/ou desbloqueio do seu cartão de crédito e débito;
Localização: Encontre agências, horários e contactos facilmente.
Personalização: Tem um ecrã inicial com atalho para as suas principais opções;
Preenchimento automático de dados, para que não perca tempo;
Gosta da nossa APP? Pode avaliá-la e deixar-nos um comentário. A sua opinião é importante para continuarmos a melhorar.",2014-01-30T20:50:44Z,2025-11-19T06:04:02Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,6,1436799971,Binance: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto,Binance Switzerland AG,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/binance-buy-bitcoin-crypto/id1436799971?uo=4,0.0,4.75885,763,Finance,"Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.
Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong.
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority (""FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).
Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.
*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges
Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:
- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.

- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.",2018-10-06T19:55:47Z,2025-11-22T06:12:13Z
mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,7,6749850153,Moza Banco,MozaBanco,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/moza-banco/id6749850153?uo=4,0.0,3,8,Finance,"Moza Banco Mobile App – Your New Digital Banking Experience
Your bank, anytime and anywhere.
Moza Banco Mobile App puts your bank right in the palm of your hand — fast, secure, and easy to use.
Built for the next generation of digital banking, it offers a seamless, intuitive experience to make your daily banking smarter and simpler.
Enhanced Security at Every Step
Bank with total peace of mind. Your security is our top priority, with advanced protection built into every transaction:
Log in with biometric recognition (facial or fingerprint).
Authorize transfers securely with OTP (One-Time Password) sent by SMS.
Reset or change your password online — no need to visit a branch.
Enjoy automatic logout after 10 minutes of inactivity.
All your data is encrypted, and you receive real-time alerts.
Remember: Your credentials, PINs, and OTP codes are personal and confidential. Never share them — and always use official Moza Banco channels.
Transfers and Payments in Seconds
Move your money anytime, anywhere — no queues, no delays. Enjoy fast, secure transactions with just a few taps:
Transfer to Moza Banco or other banks.
Send money to one-time or saved beneficiaries.
Schedule future transactions.
Pay for services such as water, INSS, JUE, and more.
Buy mobile top-ups instantly.
Make payments using entity and reference.
Send multiple wallet transfers at once with a single authentication.
Cards with Greater Control and Security
Your cards are always within reach. Easily manage your debit, prepaid, and credit cards wherever you are:
View all your cards in one place, physical or digital.
Pay your credit card in full, partially, or the minimum amount.
Instantly block or cancel your card if it’s lost.
Check expiry dates and recent transactions with ease.
Integrated Mobile Wallets
Connect seamlessly to the country’s top mobile wallets:
Send money directly to M-Pesa, M-Kesh, and E-Mola, quickly and securely.
The beneficiary’s name appears automatically when you enter their number.
Make multiple transfers at once — the app does the rest with one authentication.
Support Whenever You Need It
We’re here for you anytime, anywhere.
For assistance, contact Customer Service (95247 / 21342020) or visit your nearest Moza Banco branch.
The Moza Banco Mobile App reflects our commitment to innovation, convenience, and you.
Mobile App – simpler, more modern, and intuitive.
mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,8,6445949572,FlexMoney,FLEX MONEY TRANSFER LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/flexmoney/id6445949572?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Finance,"Instant, Competitive Money Transfer from Kenya

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,9,1054409044,Standard Bank MZ NETPlus APP,STANDARD BANK SA,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/standard-bank-mz-netplus-app/id1054409044?uo=4,0.0,3.73333,90,Finance,"NETPlus permite-lhe aceder às suas contas a qualquer hora e em qualquer lugar, bem como efectuar transferências intra e interbancárias em tempo real.

Trata-se de um canal electrónico robusto projectado com a mais recente tecnologia gráfica e de autenticação de transacções, através do uso de palavras-chaves enviadas por SMS e combinação de posições do cartão matriz.
A maior das vantagens, é a possibilidade de recuperar a palavra-chave sem ter que se deslocar ao balcão para o efeito.
Aceda ao NETPlus utilizando os mesmos códigos de acesso para as versões “Mobile” e “Desktop”.
Operações principais disponíveis no NETPlus:
Consulta de saldos
Visualização de movimentos da conta
Listagem de cartões de débito
Visualização de valores a cobrança
Cancelamento de cartões de débito
Requisição de cartões de débito
Transferências intrabancárias
Transferências interbancárias
Listagem de valores cativos
Requisição de cheques
Pagamento adiantado de cartões de crédito
Pagamento de serviços (Televisão, Água, Electricidade, Internet, etc.)
Constituição e informação sobre depósitos a prazo
Informação sobre empréstimos bancários
Compra de recargas (Telemóvel, Televisão, Internet, etc.)
Serviço de notificação de pagamentos
Localização geográfica das ATMs e POS
Informação sobre produtos e serviços bancários.

Gradualmente serão incorporadas novas funcionalidades. Contamos com a sua contribuição para melhorar este produto. Caso tenha alguma sugestão ou comentário contacte-nos pelo e-mail linhadocliente@standardbank.co.mz ou pelo telefone 800 412 412/(+258) 21 329 777.",2016-07-07T08:27:56Z,2025-11-05T13:09:59Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,10,932493382,Revolut - Mobile Finance,Revolut Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/revolut-mobile-finance/id932493382?uo=4,0.0,4.85806,155,Finance,"Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.
This description is relevant for UK residents only.
Make your spend, well-spent
- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way
Send money near, far, wherever they are
- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension
Save the interest-ing way
- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying
Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)
- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend
- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).
Unlock security features that you control
- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money
How we protect your money
- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.",2015-03-01T14:54:14Z,2025-11-20T16:41:08Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,11,413251709,MetaTrader 5,MetaQuotes Software Corp.,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/metatrader-5/id413251709?uo=4,0.0,4.69093,893,Finance,"Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.
TRADING
• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history
ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY
• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services
TECHNICAL ANALYSIS
• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line
Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.",2012-06-03T09:02:18Z,2025-11-10T22:58:44Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,12,612261027,Wise - Global Money,Wise Payments Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/wise-global-money/id612261027?uo=4,0.0,4.75912,137,Finance,"16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.
— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics
— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details
— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction
— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts
— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed
— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more
Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,13,1565335463,mkesh,Mocambique Telecom SA,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/mkesh/id1565335463?uo=4,0.0,2.91304,23,Finance,"A Carteira Móvel, SA é uma instituição de moeda electrónica, detida pela Tmcel e IGEPE, que traz até si o mkesh, o primeiro serviço financeiro de moeda electrónica aprovado em Moçambique e disponível no celular 24/24h, em todo País na rede Tmcel.

Ao aderir gratuitamente ao mkesh, o seu número do celular (82 ou 83) passa a ser o seu número de conta mkesh, sem saldos mínimos obrigatórios nem despesas de manutenção. O serviço mkesh tem como objectivo permitir, de forma fácil e segura, o acesso à toda população de serviços financeiros básicos tais como guardar e movimentar dinheiro, mesmo sem possuir uma conta bancaria tradicional.
Através do mkesh, poderá enviar dinheiro para os seus familiares e amigos, bem como fazer pagamento de bens e serviços e ainda comprar recargas Tmcel, com grandes vantagens e bónus.
Este serviço, dinamiza as trocas comerciais nos meios sub-urbanos e rurais, contribuindo activamente para o desenvolvimento do País.",2021-10-06T07:00:00Z,2024-10-01T12:37:01Z

ABOUT EXNESS

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,18,1205990992,TradingView: Track All Markets,"TradingView, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/tradingview-track-all-markets/id1205990992?uo=4,0.0,4.82508,909,Finance,"In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set:
World-leading charts

A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.
Simple Pine Script for complex tools

From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.
Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.
Unmissable alerts
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.
Made to trade
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.
One app to track them all

Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.
Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.
Watchlist what matters

Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be.
Data. Data. Data,

Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.
Never trade alone again

Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.
Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.
Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/",2017-04-24T11:29:54Z,2025-11-21T18:13:56Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,22,918126133,MB WAY,"SIBS FORWARD PAYMENT SOLUTIONS, S.A.",https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/mb-way/id918126133?uo=4,0.0,5,1,Finance,"The MB WAY app is SIBS' digital solution that simplifies your payments by allowing you to do everything in one place! By connecting your mobile phone number to your bank card, you can send, request and receive money, split accounts, generate MB NET virtual cards, shop online and in physical shops with QR Code or NFC and even win prizes. You can track your subscriptions and recurring payments in your app. You can also withdraw cash and use MULTIBANCO just with MB WAY. With MB WAY pulse you can pay with MB WAY even when your smartphone is switched off, without battery or internet access.

All of this always with SIBS security guarantee. The MB WAY app is the No.1 payment app in Portugal and already a reference, with more than 6,5 million users who use its advantages daily, making it the favorite payment app of the Portuguese.
FUNCTIONALITIES
How to pay with MB WAY?
To pay in shop, when paying for your purchases in physical shops, simply select the ""Pagar com MB WAY"" button and choose the ""QR Code"" or ""NFC"" option.

- QR Code - After the merchant enters the purchase amount in the terminal and confirms OK, a QR Code is generated. Simply scan this QR Code on the payment terminal. If the purchase is more than the amount without PIN, confirm with your MB WAY PIN, touch ID or face ID.
- NFC - Touch your mobile phone to the payment terminal. If the purchase exceeds the amount without PIN, confirm in the MB WAY app and pull over again.
To pay in online shops, select the MB WAY payment method and enter your mobile phone number. You will receive a notification to confirm the payment with your MB WAY PIN.
How to buy with MB NET?

When paying for your online purchases, access the MB WAY app and generate an MB NET card in the ""Cartões MB NET"" option. Then, on the merchant's website, select pay with card and enter the details of the MB NET card you generated.
How to use MULTIBANCO?

To use the ""Utilizar MULTIBANCO” option with the MB WAY app, you must choose the amount you want to withdraw and enter your MB WAY PIN or touch ID. Then, with the generated code, go to a MULTIBANCO ATM, press the green key and choose the ""Withdraw Money"" option. You can also generate a code for someone else to go to MULTIBANCO to withdraw. You can also use this option “Utilizar MULTIBANCO” to carry out other operations available at MULTIBANCO.
How to send money?

Simply press the ""Enviar Dinheiro"" button, enter a contact and the amount you want to send and confirm the operation with your MB WAY PIN. The money will be immediately available in your contact's account.
How to request money?
To request money, simply select the ""Pedir Dinheiro"" button in the app, select the contact you want to request money from, indicate the amount, and confirm the operation.
You can also request the amount through your personal QR Code.
How to split an account?
To split an account, simply select the ""Dividir Conta"" button. Then, select the contacts with whom you want to split the bill, indicate the amount of the bill, and confirm the operation.
How to join authorized payments?

To manage your subscriptions or recurring payments through ""Pagamentos Autorizados"", simply select this payment method on the participating partner, enter your mobile phone number, confirm on your MB WAY, enter your PIN for confirmation and you're done!
How to activate MB WAY?
1. Link your bank card at an ATM (MULTIBANCO)
2. Download the app for free and activate it with your mobile number
MB WAY is the only official digital payments app from SIBS, accepted by all major banks in Portugal.
How to activate MB WAY pulse?

Use MB WAY pulse to make contactless payments through another device: bracelet, key ring or clip for your watch, but with the cards you have associated with MB WAY. You can now make purchases with MB WAY pulse without having to have your smartphone with you.",2014-10-27T07:00:00Z,2025-08-27T13:50:28Z

mz,Mozambique,Finance,6015,23,1545790758,Paidwork: Make Money,Paidwork LLC,https://apps.apple.com/mz/app/paidwork-make-money/id1545790758?uo=4,0.0,4.21978,91,Finance,"Paidwork is full time or additional job for all people, from every country. You can earn money on any device with access to the internet, wherever you are. You will get paid for your spend time and engagement on the platform.

You can choose how you want to earn money – by playing games, completing surveys, typing texts, answering questions, watching video ads, browsing websites, creating accounts, completing offers and shopping online.
By following simple instructions, just in a month you can earn up to £600 – without any additional taxes and charges. However, there is no limit of your earnings – you set your own working hours.
How Paidwork works:
Step 1. Choose one of the four monetization methods (see below).
Step 2. Follow the instructions. E.g. fill out a survey, play a game, answer a question, create an account, watch a video, test a product and much more.
Step 3. After completing the task correctly you will immediately receive funds to your account.
Monetization methods:
1) Playing games
2) Filling out surveys
3) Watching videos
4) Online shopping
5) Microtasks
6) Scanning receipts
How are the funds paid out?
Available withdrawal methods are: Bank transfer and PayPal. The minimum withdrawal amount is £1. You will receive the funds within 1-2 hours.
How long do I have to earn to withdraw funds?

You earn as much as the time and commitment you want to spend. Perform the most paid tasks such as surveys, games, cashback and registrations. Depending on the difficulty of the task, your salary may be higher.
Is there a referral program?
Yes. You can invite anyone to earn money on Paidwork. You will both get £8 for free when the invited person makes their first payout.

Paidwork app is the only place for free games, free money, cash app, savings, working remotely. Get paid real cash money for playing games, filling out surveys, watching videos, completing offers and typing texts. Make more money for inviting friends! Earn cash money rewards by trying free games, apps, & watching short videos. Get paid cash instantly for shopping & save money with the Paidwork app. Real money and free to use app. Choose anything you want and just start earning!
For any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at: feedback@paidwork.com",2021-01-05T08:00:00Z,2025-08-21T13:36:57Z

BRImo memungkinkan pendaftaran akun BRI dan buka rekening secara full digital tanpa perlu kartu debit, baik dari dalam maupun luar negeri. Nasabah dapat mendaftar menggunakan nomor HP dari 11 negara, termasuk Jepang, Korea Selatan, Hong Kong, USA, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Malaysia, Taiwan, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Proses pendaftaran menjadi lebih fleksibel dan mudah.
• Transaksi Antar Negara

BRImo memudahkan nasabah yang memiliki kebutuhan transaksi internasional melalui fitur transfer ke lebih dari 160 negara. Selain itu, BRImo mendukung pembayaran menggunakan QR di luar negeri (Singapura), memberikan kemudahan bertransaksi saat bepergian.
• Lifestyle dan Entertainment

BRImo menyediakan berbagai layanan gaya hidup serta hiburan seperti pembelian voucher game, streaming, tiket BRI Liga 1, hingga pemesanan dan pembayaran tiket transportasi termasuk pesawat, semuanya dalam satu aplikasi.
• Investasi

BRImo menyediakan beragam pilihan produk investasi bagi nasabah, mulai dari dana pensiun hingga emas. Bekerja sama dengan Pegadaian, BRImo menawarkan layanan jual, beli, dan cicil emas. Nasabah dapat mengelola investasinya dengan mudah melalui dashboard KSEI dan akses langsung ke BRIGHTS untuk pembelian saham.
• Transaksi Sehari-Hari

BRImo memudahkan berbagai transaksi harian, mulai dari pembayaran tagihan dan cicilan, top up e-wallet dan pulsa/paket data, hingga pembayaran QRIS dengan sumber dana kartu kredit. BRImo juga memungkinkan setor tunai tanpa kartu di ATM BRI, memberikan kemudahan ekstra dalam mengelola keuangan. Dapatkan BRIpoin setiap kali bertransaksi dan tukarkan poin tersebut dengan berbagai e-voucher menarik.
• Layanan Pelanggan yang Mudah Diakses
BRImo menyediakan layanan Contact BRI bebas pulsa, serta fitur chat dalam aplikasi untuk pengaduan transaksi, memastikan nasabah mendapatkan bantuan dengan cepat dan efisien.
• Cashback Realtime

BRImo menjadi satu-satunya aplikasi mobile banking yang menawarkan cashback secara realtime untuk berbagai transaksi finansial, memberikan nilai tambah bagi setiap transaksi yang dilakukan. Jangan lewatkan kesempatan untuk menikmati berbagai manfaat eksklusif hanya di BRImo!
